author: Brandjuh
description: Scrapes alliance application data from MissionChief USA. Tracks new member applications with status, credits, and buildings information.
install_msg:
✅ Applications Scraper installed!

Use `[p]load applicationsscraper` to enable.

Commands (owner only):
• `[p]scrape_applications` - Manual scrape

Automatic scraping runs every hour at :55

Database: scraper_databases/applications.db
Fields: applicant info, status, credits, buildings, timestamp
short: Alliance applications tracker with applicant statistics
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores scraped MissionChief application data in a local SQLite database.
